JESE CONFIRMS LAS PALMAS TALKS

Stoke forward Jese Rodriguez has confirmed he was in talks over a return to former club Las Palmas during the January transfer window.

The Spaniard, who is on loan at Stoke until the end of the season from Paris Saint-Germain, had been tipped to re-join Las Palmas, who had him on loan for the second half of last season.

“An offer [from Las Palmas] in winter? There were conversations, but the reality is that speaking with [Las Palmas president] Miguel Angel Ramirez there were difficulties,” he told Spanish radio show El Larguero.

“There was also the matter of my child. I preferred to stay with him, look after my son, and then it was already too late.”

BALE'S RETURN?

News coming out of Spain this morning suggests Gareth Bale could be on his way back to England, with the Real Madrid forward's agent sounding out interest in him.

Newspaper Sport states the Wales talisman would prefer a return to the Premier League, but is open to other offers - and that conversations have already been held with PSG.

replies.msg:
Neymar is Real Madrid’s main objective this summer. The club expects Neymar and his father to force or manage to disengage from PSG according to the agreement the club representatives and Neymar’s father had on December 7 in the Balón d’Or gala in Paris [marca]

Neymar believes signing for PSG was a mistake; he’s tired of playing in a “weak” league & he doesn’t have a good relationship with some of the players specially the Argentina clan formed by Di María, Pastore, Lo Celso and the Uruguayan Cavani. Neymar wants Real Madrid. [marca]

French clubs do not have a buyout clause but Real Madrid learned that in Neymar’s contract with PSG, there’s a clause that states Neymar can leave for €222M in the summer of 2019, the same amount PSG paid to Barça. However, Neymar & Madrid want it done this summer. [marca]

Real Madrid are expecting to spend around €300M for Neymar which they can afford; club in past 4 years spent €281M in transfers and sold players for €294M, leaving a positive balance of €13M. Club also expect to bring in €100-150M this summer from Bale & Benzema. [marca]
